short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your standard and boring new tab screen with BullTab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BullTab replaces your standard Chrome new tab with another screen that has light and dark mode, a beautiful animated background which you can turn off in case it does not suit your style, displays random motivational quotes each time you open it, shows you the current time, besides having a section(Todo list) where you can mark all the goals that you wish to accomplish, and is generally much more aesthetically pleasing than the standard one.
